snippet: Industrial machinery, computers and aircraft bookings climbed, while orders for motor vehicles decreased, a report showed.
lead_paragraph: Industrial machinery, computers and aircraft bookings climbed, while orders for motor vehicles decreased, a report showed.

headline.main: Capital Goods Orders Rise the Most in 3 Months
headline.print_headline: Capital Goods Orders Rise the Most in 3 Months
headline.seo: Orders for Capital Goods Rose the Most in 3 Months
